data.title: Pushing On
data.dscription: Justin Skeesuck and Patrick Gray have been best friends since childhood. They always played outside and went exploring together when they were young. As they grew up, they went to different universities but managed to stay close. When he was in his 30s, Skeesuck got a disease that left him unable to use his muscles, and he had to be in a wheelchair. The two friends didn't want this to stop them from living life to the fullest, so they decided to hike 500 miles through Spain. 詳全文：Pushing On
